trends: There have been no other sightings in Lolo
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details1. in vehicle w\husband; riding to work; husband driving. 2. saw beam of light shining onto highway 93 between florence & lolo. 3. thought it was a helicopter. 4. light shining through low clouds; no movement of clouds, no sound (ruled out helicopter because no sound or movement of clouds); object moving slowly south, south east (we were driving north to missoula); when object was above us i rolled down the car window & looked up to see shape was a triangle with 3 lights in each corner and 1 light in center which we saw originally. object moving more easterly at time i looked up at object. object cont east; we continued north toward lolo. 5. curiosity main feeling after we realized it was not helicopter or hot air balloon or weather balloon. my actions were to cont to watch object as long as possible to determine what we were seeing. 6. we lost sight of object over sapphire mountains as the object moved east and we cont north. i don't remember the exact day in march 1996, but was a week day.
Summary: triangle-3 white lights in corners 1 in center
